##========================================================================
## NAME
=pod

=head1 NAME

Tie::File::Indexed::Utf8 - tied array access to indexed data files: utf8-encoded strings

=cut

##========================================================================
## SYNOPSIS
=pod

=head1 SYNOPSIS

 use Tie::File::Indexed::Utf8;
 tie(my @data, 'Tie::File::Indexed::Utf8', $filename, %options) or die ...
 
 ##-- add some data
 $data[0] = "\x{c4}";     # store a utf8 string (Latin-1 Supplement / LATIN SMALL LETTER O WITH DIAERESIS)
 $data[1] = "\x{262e}";   # ... or a real utf8-string (Miscellaneous Symbols / PEACE SYMBOL)
 print $data[1];          # retrieve & print a stored value


=cut

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

Tie::File::Indexed::Utf8 provides a
L<Tie::File::Indexed|Tie::File::Indexed> subclass for
storing arrays of utf8-encoded strings.

=cut

## END POD DOCUMENTATION, auto-generated by podextract.perl
=pod
